help.short: The name of the edge cluster.

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the edge cluster.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="additionalInfo">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ErrorDetail_read>" name="details" identifiers="message target">
<prop type="array<@OperationStatusResult_read>" name="operations">

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the edge cluster.
The identity of the edge cluster.
Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.
The geo-location where the resource lives

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$edgeClusterParameters.properties.entraConfiguration.adminGroupObjectIds" options="admin-group-object-ids" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$edgeClusterParameters.properties.workloadResourceIds" options="workload-resource-ids" group="Properties">

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="availableUpgradeRuntimeVersions" identifiers="targetRuntimeVersionId">
<prop type="array" name="adminGroupObjectIds" required="True">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="infrastructureResourceIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="requiredEndpointAllowList">
<prop type="array" name="workloadResourceIds">

help.short: The name of the edge cluster.
Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.
The Azure resource tags that will replace the existing ones.

<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="requiredEndpointAllowList">
<prop type="array" name="workloadResourceIds">
